name: Goo! An Essay Writing Simulator!
description:
Goo! Is a Visual Novel/Input game based around the concept of using an outdated search engine to do research for an essay you're writing. Using your Digital Assistant A.N.N.A. you will explore the internet and write a (Hopefully) flawless essay for Professor Strudden. There are currently 8 different endings. Due to Time constraints with the Game Jam, the soundtrack and sound effects will be added later.

This demo was made for Minijam 47 based around the theme of the internet!
